gov.nih.nlm.ling.transform

Class CoordinationTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.transform.CoordinationTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependencyTransformation

    public class CoordinationTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements DependencyTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms a Sentence object by decomposing coordination instances.

    A conjunction dependency in the form of conj_X(a,b), where X is the coordinating conjunction, is transformed into two dependencies of the form CC(X,a) and CC(X,b), where CC is either cc or negcc (if negated). Serial coordination is also taken care of.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • getPrerequisites

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends DependencyTransformation>> getPrerequisites()
        Description copied from interface: DependencyTransformation
        Gets the dependency transformation rules that should have been applied before applying the current one.

        This is because the current rule assumes a dependency configuration generated by the prerequisite rule.

        Specified by:
        getPrerequisites in interface DependencyTransformation
        Returns:
        the prerequisite dependency transformation rules, or empty list if no prerequisites

      • transform

        public void transform(Sentence sent)
        Transforms a sentence by decomposition coordination dependencies. It attempts to take care of serial coordination, as well.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface DependencyTransformation
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to transform
